group_1.textCenter: Two different groups meet up in front of@the same Witch...

group_1.textLeft: The Grief Seed is shared between all@girls who take part in the fight!

group_1.textRight: So you're saying, all one has to do is take@part in the fight...?

group_1.textLeft: Exactly.

group_1.textRight: How is this any different from "first come,@first served"?!

group_1.textLeft: That rule makes it easy for girls to argue@over who found it first, right?
So instead of deciding based on who gets@to the spot before the other...
We share the Grief Seed between@everyone who used magic in the battle!
Yes, there might still be some arguing@over who fought hardest...
But at the very least, you'll be able to@get back some of the magic you used.
Plus, it's easy enough to keep track of@who took part in the battle.
I think it's a more clear-cut solution@than "first come, first served".
Do you really think it's best for the@first one there to hoard it all?

group_1.textRight: You have me wrong. I don't think that at all.

group_1.textLeft: So...you're saying you prefer rock, paper,@scissors, then!
What, what, what? Really?!
(She shut that down fast...)

group_1.textRight: I understand... I'm fine with your@proposal.

group_1.textLeft: They say that even a tiny change in@method can yield great results.
I am in favor of Hazuki's idea.

group_1.textRight: Me too, me too! If you fight, you get credit.@That's fair. Even I get that logic!

group_1.textLeft: I agree as well!
How about you guys?

group_1.textRight: I just want to avoid arguments as much as@possible.
If you fight, you're good, right? [chara:302801:lipSynch_0][wait:0.7][chara:302801:motion_100][chara:302801:cheek_0][chara:302801:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:302801:lipSynch_1]Okay!@I'm down!

group_1.textLeft: Great! Then we've figured it out!
Everyone who fights in the battle will@share the Grief Seed.
That's our new rule going forward!
Though, I do have to say...
I have one more suggestion, if that's@okay...
